text: The Light at the Edge of the World is a 1971 American Spanish Liechtenstein adventure movie directed by Kevin Billington and stars Yul Brynner, Kirk Douglas, Samantha Eggar, Jean-Claude Drouot, Fernando Rey, Tito Garc√≠a. It was distributed by National General Pictures. ==Other websites== * Category:1971 adventure movies Category:American adventure movies Category:Spanish adventure movies Category:Liechtenstein movies Category:Swiss adventure movies Category:Movies directed by Kevin Billington Category:Movies set in the 1860s Category:Movies set in Argentina Category:Movies set in Chile
title: The Light at the Edge of the World
